2025-11-21TCCanada Shipping Act, 2001Regulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Shipping Act, 2001 (Environmental Response)Regulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Shipping Act, 2001 (Environmental Response) in order to (1) establish new requirements and amend existing requirements for the response organizations (RO) certified by Transport Canada (TC) and oil handling facility operators and consolidate them within the Environmental Response Regulations (ERR); (2) clarify and enhance RO preparedness requirements, as well as ensure that ROs have the capacity to respond more effectively to oil pollution incidents up to 10,000 tonnes; (3) revise requirements to address various gaps that TC has identified in the ERR; and (4) amend the Administrative Monetary Penalties and Notices (Canada Shipping Act, 2001) Regulations to include new requirements for plan review, reporting and notification requirements by ROs.Registration: SOR/2025-0233 Publication Date: 2025-12-03
subject: Regulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Shipping Act, 2001 (Environmental Response)
precis: Regulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Shipping Act, 2001 (Environmental Response) in order to (1) establish new requirements and amend existing requirements for the response organizations (RO) certified by Transport Canada (TC) and oil handling facility operators and consolidate them within the Environmental Response Regulations (ERR); (2) clarify and enhance RO preparedness requirements, as well as ensure that ROs have the capacity to respond more effectively to oil pollution incidents up to 10,000 tonnes; (3) revise requirements to address various gaps that TC has identified in the ERR; and (4) amend the Administrative Monetary Penalties and Notices (Canada Shipping Act, 2001) Regulations to include new requirements for plan review, reporting and notification requirements by ROs.
